dc:title: On Pilgrimage - February 1949
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Discusses Truman's attempt to nationalize steel and argues that it should be permitted as a transition to smaller group ownership, or if private ownership is efficient. Mentions the lack of support for distributism, particularly among Catholics who support government intervention.
